name: International Incubator Hagenberg
tag_list: incubator, austria, german, softwarepark, hagenberg, linz
overview:
The main objective of the International Incubator Hagenberg is to support international IT-startups based at the Softwarepark Hagenberg.

The offer includes:

  • Venture Capital: depending on the project, typically up to 300,000 Euro
  • Coaching & Mentoring
  • Softwarepark Hagenberg as location for IT-start-ups
  • Funding Assistance

Acceptance Criteria:

  • IT focus in the broad sense
  • Foundation or Relocation of the company in the Softwarepark Hagenberg
  • Proof-of-concept

The incubator is a cooperation of Softwarepark Hagenberg and tech2b with Raiffeisenlandesbank Upper Austria as a partner, supported by the Government of Upper Austria. The operating organization for the program, initiated by Prof. Dr. Bruno Buchberger (Head of Softwarepark Hagenberg), is tech2b Inkubator GmbH.
